name: df-ssp
body: |- wceq(css, cmpt(s0, cnv, crab(s1, cnv, w3a(wss(cfv(cpv, cv(s1)), cfv(cpv, cv(s0))), wss(cfv(cns, cv(s1)), cfv(cns, cv(s0))), wss(cfv(cnmcv, cv(s1)), cfv(cnmcv, cv(s0)))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ SubSp =(s0 ∈ NrmCVec ↦ { s1 ∈ NrmCVec |((+v ` s1)⊆(+v ` s0)∧(.sOLD ` s1)⊆(.sOLD ` s0)∧(normCV ` s1)⊆(normCV ` s0))})
comment: Define the class of all subspaces of normed complex vector spaces. (Contributed by NM, 26-Jan-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
